# Publishers.MakeConnectable

**Structure**

A publisher that provides explicit connectability to another publisher.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MakeConnectable<Upstream> where Upstream : Publisher
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publishers/MakeConnectable] is a [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/ConnectablePublisher], which allows you to perform configuration before publishing any elements. Call [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/ConnectablePublisher/connect()] on this publisher when you want to attach to its upstream publisher and start producing elements.

Use the [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publisher/makeConnectable()] operator to wrap an upstream publisher with an instance of this publisher.

## Creating a connectable publisher

- **init(upstream:)**: Creates a connectable publisher, attached to the provide upstream publisher.

## Declaring supporting types

- **Publishers.MakeConnectable.Output**: The kind of values published by this publisher.
- **Publishers.MakeConnectable.Failure**: The kind of errors this publisher might publish.

## Using explicit publisher connections

- **Publishers.Autoconnect**: A publisher that automatically connects to an upstream connectable publisher.

## Conforms To

- ConnectablePublisher
- Publisher
